favorites.text: "The strong person is not the one who can wrestle someone else down. The strong person is the one who can control himself when he is angry."
"He who believes in Allah and the Last Day should treat his neighbor well. And he who believes in Allah and the Last Day should entertain his guest generously."
"He who believes in Allah and the Last Day should treat his neighbor well. And he who believes in Allah and the Last Day should entertain his guest generously."
"The most beloved deeds to Allah are those which are done regularly, even if they are few."
The best of you are those who are best to their families, and I am the best to my family.
favorites.chapter: The Book of Maintaining Good Relations with Relatives

favorites.text: The strong person is not the one who can wrestle someone else down. The strong person is the one who can control himself when he is angry.
Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day, let him speak good or remain silent.

He who believes in Allah and the Last Day should treat his neighbor well. And he who believes in Allah and the Last Day should entertain his guest generously.
